title: When others provide data about you to Facebook
summary.text.1: Your Facebook data lists {{number_companies}} companies as so-called “connected advertisers”. Those companies have uploaded contact lists – which also include your contact information – to Facebook. Their aim: To target you with their advertising. For that to happen you gave them or one of their data partners permission. Where you aware of that?
summary.text.2: Facebook says on their website that advertisers are not only using their own contact lists but can also use lists of other companies to target their advertising. This means they can include or exclude you from certain campaigns e.g based on your location.
